targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100", mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100", mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="localhost:9100"}[$__rate_interval])))

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
